option.name: content
option.value:
Avoid overly verbose descriptions or unnecessary details. Start with a short sentence in imperative form, no more than 50 characters long. Then leave an empty line and continue with a more detailed explanation. Write only one sentence for the first part, and two or three sentences at most for the detailed explanation.
quiero que los comits se hagan con el prefix antes

list.name: Changes
list.comment:
chore: add packageManager field to package.json
Added the `packageManager` field to explicitly specify `pnpm@10.11.0`. This ensures consistency in package management across environments.

task.summary: Default task

Initialize Next.js project with ESLint and TypeScript setup
Set up a new Next.js project with configuration files for TypeScript and ESLint, including necessary dependencies and scripts for development and production. IntelliJ IDEA project settings were also included. This commit provides the foundation for development with modern linting and type-checking support.

Remove package-lock.json from the repository
The package-lock.json file was deleted to prevent version locking in shared environments or to reduce repository size. Dependencies will now rely solely on package.json, allowing more flexible and dynamic resolutions during installation.

Remove unused files and update dependencies.
Deleted legacy files, redundant project configuration files, and old example code. Updated `tsconfig.json` paths and added new dependencies in `pnpm-lock.yaml` to reflect project changes. Cleaned up for a more streamlined structure.

Add Clerk authentication middleware and UI integration
Introduced Clerk middleware for route protection and configured it for specific paths. Updated the root layout to include ClerkProvider and authentication UI components (SignIn, SignUp, and UserButton) for better user session management.

Add Projects page and remove unused SVG assets
Added a new Projects page with a table view and modal for creating projects. Removed unused SVG assets (file.svg, globe.svg, next.svg, vercel.svg, window.svg) to clean up the public directory. Added a logo_large_dark.svg asset for branding purposes.

Refactor component props and improve code readability
Added unique keys to list items in the Projects page for better React rendering. Simplified and streamlined imports in the layout file for consistency. Addressed TypeScript linting with a temporary rule adjustment in the API route.

Refactor project management API and improve UI functionality.
Replaced legacy API routes with new standardized endpoints for better project management. Enhanced the Projects page with SWR integration, a loader component, and dynamic project listing. Updated dependencies for improved performance and added utility files like `fetcher` and `db-manager`.

Ignore `/data` directory in `.gitignore`
Added `/data` to `.gitignore` to prevent tracking local data files. This ensures cleaner project management and avoids sharing unnecessary files.

Add dynamic project management and improve deployment UI
Revised project API for dynamic orgId-based endpoints and adjusted deployment timing. Integrated a new "Deploying" component for better user feedback during builds and improved application metadata for branding. Enhanced project pages with conditional rendering, SWR data fetching, and cleaner code.

Add dynamic project management and improve API integration
Refactored project APIs to support dynamic orgId-based endpoints and improved database handling with lazy initialization. Introduced SWR for efficient data fetching in project pages and optimized the UI with conditional rendering and loaders. Updated eslint and TypeScript rules, cleaned unused code in db-manager, and enhanced overall code quality.

Integrate Nuqs adapter and improve project data handling
Added the Nuqs adapter for better state management and routing. Enhanced project data visualization with dynamic collection/document handling, improved database API routes for structured responses, and introduced real-time indicators. Upgraded dependencies and refactored UI components for a cleaner, more interactive experience.

Add "Start collection" and "Start document" buttons
This commit introduces "Start collection" and "Start document" buttons to improve user interaction and navigation in the project view. Additionally, minor adjustments were made to the navbar, including making labels clickable for better user experience.

Add "Start collection" and "Start document" buttons
Improve user interaction by introducing buttons for creating collections and documents in the project view. Enhanced navigation with clickable labels in the navbar and addressed minor UI adjustments for a better user experience.

Add POST handler for database method execution
Introduced a new POST endpoint to handle dynamic database method execution based on projectId, method, and parameters. Simplified the GET handler by removing unnecessary calls and debug logs. These changes improve API functionality and maintainability.

Refactor Naro URI logic and adjust input width
Updated the `naroUri` to use the current window location and a new format for consistency. Removed an unused `useRef` import and increased the maximum width of the input field for better UI flexibility.

Add project validation to database POST handler
Enhanced the POST endpoint by incorporating project existence validation using `getDatabase()`. Added error handling and improved logging for better troubleshooting of API issues.

Refactor Naro URI to use instance.id for clarity
Updated the `naroUri` generation logic to use `instance.id` instead of `instance.applicationId` for better accuracy and clarity. This change ensures the correct identifier is utilized in the database API URL.

build: Update @narodb/naro to version 0.1.0
Upgraded @narodb/naro from 0.0.7 to 0.1.0 to include new features and dependencies. This update adds "redaxios" as a dependency and adjusts the package integrity hash to ensure compatibility.

feat: add modal store, collection, and document modals
Introduce Zustand-based modal state management for better reusability. Add modals for creating collections and documents, including dynamic form handling for document fields. Update routes and components to integrate the new functionality seamlessly.

feat: implement project deletion functionality
Added support for deleting a project instance through a new `DELETE` API endpoint and associated UI changes. Updated the delete button to call the handler and ensured proper cleanup of associated database entries. Minor improvement to input auto-completion for better user experience.

**feat: update icons and enhance list item interactivity**
Replaced `PlusIcon` with `PlusCircleIcon` for better visual clarity and added a `MinusCircleIcon` button to list items. Updated styling to show the button only on hover for improved user experience.

chore: add packageManager field to package.json
Added the `packageManager` field to explicitly specify `pnpm@10.11.0`. This ensures consistency in package management across environments.

MESSAGE.value:
Initialize Next.js project with ESLint and TypeScript setup
Set up a new Next.js project with configuration files for TypeScript and ESLint, including necessary dependencies and scripts for development and production. IntelliJ IDEA project settings were also included. This commit provides the foundation for development with modern linting and type-checking support.

Remove package-lock.json from the repository
The package-lock.json file was deleted to prevent version locking in shared environments or to reduce repository size. Dependencies will now rely solely on package.json, allowing more flexible and dynamic resolutions during installation.

Remove unused files and update dependencies.
Deleted legacy files, redundant project configuration files, and old example code. Updated `tsconfig.json` paths and added new dependencies in `pnpm-lock.yaml` to reflect project changes. Cleaned up for a more streamlined structure.

Add Clerk authentication middleware and UI integration
Introduced Clerk middleware for route protection and configured it for specific paths. Updated the root layout to include ClerkProvider and authentication UI components (SignIn, SignUp, and UserButton) for better user session management.

Add Projects page and remove unused SVG assets
Added a new Projects page with a table view and modal for creating projects. Removed unused SVG assets (file.svg, globe.svg, next.svg, vercel.svg, window.svg) to clean up the public directory. Added a logo_large_dark.svg asset for branding purposes.

Refactor component props and improve code readability
Added unique keys to list items in the Projects page for better React rendering. Simplified and streamlined imports in the layout file for consistency. Addressed TypeScript linting with a temporary rule adjustment in the API route.

Refactor project management API and improve UI functionality.
Replaced legacy API routes with new standardized endpoints for better project management. Enhanced the Projects page with SWR integration, a loader component, and dynamic project listing. Updated dependencies for improved performance and added utility files like `fetcher` and `db-manager`.

Refactor project APIs and UI for dynamic management
Replaced static project API routes with dynamic orgId-based endpoints and standardized database handling with lazy initialization. Improved project pages by integrating SWR for data fetching, adding loaders, and showing dynamic project details. Deprecated and commented out unused database manager methods for cleaner code.

Ignore `/data` directory in `.gitignore`
Added `/data` to `.gitignore` to prevent tracking local data files. This ensures cleaner project management and avoids sharing unnecessary files.

Add dynamic project management and improve deployment UI
Revised project API for dynamic orgId-based endpoints and adjusted deployment timing. Integrated a new "Deploying" component for better user feedback during builds and improved application metadata for branding. Enhanced project pages with conditional rendering, SWR data fetching, and cleaner code.

Add dynamic project management and improve API integration
Refactored project APIs to support dynamic orgId-based endpoints and improved database handling with lazy initialization. Introduced SWR for efficient data fetching in project pages and optimized the UI with conditional rendering and loaders. Updated eslint and TypeScript rules, cleaned unused code in db-manager, and enhanced overall code quality.

Integrate Nuqs adapter and improve project data handling
Added the Nuqs adapter for better state management and routing. Enhanced project data visualization with dynamic collection/document handling, improved database API routes for structured responses, and introduced real-time indicators. Upgraded dependencies and refactored UI components for a cleaner, more interactive experience.

Add "Start collection" and "Start document" buttons
This commit introduces "Start collection" and "Start document" buttons to improve user interaction and navigation in the project view. Additionally, minor adjustments were made to the navbar, including making labels clickable for better user experience.

Add "Start collection" and "Start document" buttons
Improve user interaction by introducing buttons for creating collections and documents in the project view. Enhanced navigation with clickable labels in the navbar and addressed minor UI adjustments for a better user experience.

Add POST handler for database method execution
Introduced a new POST endpoint to handle dynamic database method execution based on projectId, method, and parameters. Simplified the GET handler by removing unnecessary calls and debug logs. These changes improve API functionality and maintainability.

Refactor Naro URI logic and adjust input width
Updated the `naroUri` to use the current window location and a new format for consistency. Removed an unused `useRef` import and increased the maximum width of the input field for better UI flexibility.

Add project validation to database POST handler
Enhanced the POST endpoint by incorporating project existence validation using `getDatabase()`. Added error handling and improved logging for better troubleshooting of API issues.

Update POST handler with project validation logic
Added project existence validation to the database POST endpoint using `getDatabase()`. Improved error handling and logging to enhance API reliability and simplify troubleshooting.

Refactor Naro URI to use instance.id for clarity
Updated the `naroUri` generation logic to use `instance.id` instead of `instance.applicationId` for better accuracy and clarity. This change ensures the correct identifier is utilized in the database API URL.

build: Update @narodb/naro to version 0.1.0
Upgraded @narodb/naro from 0.0.7 to 0.1.0 to include new features and dependencies. This update adds "redaxios" as a dependency and adjusts the package integrity hash to ensure compatibility.

Add support for removing databases in DbManager
Introduced a `removeDb` method to allow cleanup of specific databases. This includes clearing associated intervals and deleting the database instance, ensuring proper resource management.

feat: add modal store, collection, and document modals
Introduce Zustand-based modal state management for better reusability. Add modals for creating collections and documents, including dynamic form handling for document fields. Update routes and components to integrate the new functionality seamlessly.

feat: implement project deletion functionality
Added support for deleting a project instance through a new `DELETE` API endpoint and associated UI changes. Updated the delete button to call the handler and ensured proper cleanup of associated database entries. Minor improvement to input auto-completion for better user experience.

**feat: update icons and enhance list item interactivity**
Replaced `PlusIcon` with `PlusCircleIcon` for better visual clarity and added a `MinusCircleIcon` button to list items. Updated styling to show the button only on hover for improved user experience.

chore: add packageManager field to package.json
Added the `packageManager` field to explicitly specify `pnpm@10.11.0`. This ensures consistency in package management across environments.
